d.f: ￹￺a grammatical marker indicating the state of something￻文法上的用語指某些事情的狀態

e: ￹`Ma~`fana'~ `cingra~ `to~ `nika~ `ira~ `ako~.￺He knows I am here.￻他知道我在這裡
d.f: ￹￺a grammatical marker indicating the opening to a dependent clause￻文法上的用語指話承上轉接到獨立句子

e: ￹`O~ `nika~ `fana'~ `iso~ `tonini~ `ko~ `nga'ay~.￺Your knowing this is good. / You should know this.￻你應該知道這件事
d.f: ￹￺a grammatical marker indicating "should"￻文法上的用語指應該
